1.text: Break the blush with a spoon.

2.text: Add in a few droplets of rubbing alcohol.

3.text: Mix the alcohol thoroughly with a spoon.

4.text: Flatten the blush with the spoon.

5.text: Crush the blush into pieces with a toothpick.

6.text: Even out the blush powder with a knife.

7.text: Lay a makeup removing wipe on the blush.

8.text: Use your fingertips to help combine the blush pieces.

9.text: Dab the blush powder with a makeup removing wipe.
